text: Love Jones may refer to: * Love Jones (film), a 1997 romantic drama film ** Love Jones (soundtrack), a soundtrack album from the film * Love Jones (band), an American pop group * "Love Jones", a 1972 song by Brighter Side of Darkness, or the same-titled 1973 album * "Love Jones", a 2000 song by Eartha * "Love Jones", a 2020 song by Lil Yachty from Lil Boat 3 * John Love Jones (1885–1913), Welsh footballer * Sir Love Jones-Parry, 1st Baronet (1832–1891), Welsh politician
title: Love Jones
